description: Candidates give their views on the future of the criminal justice system in Guernsey.
title: Guernsey Election 2020: Reform of the legal system
title_page: Guernsey Election 2020: Reform of the legal system - BBC News
maintext: Heidi Soulsby, from The Guernsey Partnership of Independents, said: "There needs to be a clear sentencing policy set by the States that can be applied by the judiciary to provide greater transparency of the process and to address issues of perceived unfairness, as well as a greater use of restorative justice approaches to support both victims and offenders."
